title-part.text: SIGNALLING OR CALLING SYSTEMS
ORDER TELEGRAPHS
ALARM SYSTEMS

reference.text: signalling arrangements on vehicles B60Q, B62D41/00; railway signalling systems or devices B61L; on cycles B62J3/00, B62J6/00; safes or strong-rooms with alarm devices E05G; signalling or alarm devices in mines E21F17/18; lamps or shutters therefor F21; sensitive measuring elements, see the appropriate subclasses of G01; traffic control systems G08G; visual indicating means G09; sound-producing devices G10; radio or near-field calling systems H04B5/00, H04B7/00; selecting arrangements H04Q7/00, H04Q9/00; loudspeakers, microphones, gramophone pick-ups or like acoustic electromechanical transducers H04R

note.note-paragraph: This subclass covers also means for identifying or incapacitating burglars or the like.

In this subclass, the following term is used with the meaning indicated:
- "systems" may cover also devices peculiar thereto.

CPC-specific-text.text: Image analysis to detect motion of the intruder, e.g. by frame subtraction
involving reference image or background adaptation with time to compensate for changing conditions, e.g. reference image update on detection of light level change

pertaining to the camera

Multiple cameras having overlapping views on a single scene

the vehicle being an aircraft

title-part.text: Calibration, including self-calibrating arrangements
Provisions facilitating manual calibration, e.g. input or output provisions for testing
Holding of intermittent values to permit measurement
Self-calibration, e.g. compensating for environmental drift or ageing of components
by updating and storing reference thresholds
by changing the gain of an amplifier
Predictive alarm systems characterised by extrapolation or other computation using updated historic data
Systems for signalling characterised solely by the form of transmission of the signal
using electric transmission;

CPC-specific-text.text: transformation of alarm signals to electrical signals from a different medium, e.g. transmission of an electric alarm signal upon detection of an audible alarm signal
